source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a rural scenery shot depicting a weathered, wooden barn with a dark, shingled gambrel roof set against a flat, white, overcast sky. The entire landscape is blanketed in thick snow, with a smaller, attached section of the barn also topped with a layer of white. To the right of the main structure, a rustic wooden corral stands partially visible. The scene is framed by two out-of-focus tree trunks in the foreground—a birch tree on the left and a darker, rough-barked tree on the right—which directs the viewer's gaze toward the barn. There is no single main subject, as the framing and the stark, monochromatic environment create a composition focused on conveying a sense of quiet, cold desolation and the stillness of a winter's day.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. 画面中应该有三棵树，左边有两个树干，分别位于一前一后，远离camera的那个分叉的树干比较清晰，靠近camera的那一根树干比较模糊，右侧还有一棵树非常模糊。其余的没什么问题
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The scene should include three trees. On the left, there are two tree trunks, one in front of the other. The trunk farther from the camera, which is forked, is relatively clear, while the one closer to the camera is more blurred. Additionally, there is another very blurred tree on the right side. Other than this, everything else is fine.

generated_critique: While the caption accurately identifies the main subject as a barn in a snowy landscape, it contains several inaccuracies and omissions based on the visual content. The final sentence is entirely subjective, interpreting the scene's mood as one of "quiet, cold desolation," which violates the core instruction to avoid emotional or interpretive language. The description of the barn itself lacks specific detail; the video clearly shows it is a faded red barn with vertical siding and a large, closed hayloft door below the roof's peak, none of which is mentioned. The "smaller, attached section" is more accurately described as a simple lean-to shed on the barn's left side. Additionally, the "corral" is not a full enclosure but rather a short, two-rail wooden fence line extending from the right. Most importantly, the caption completely misses the presence of faint but distinct tire tracks in the snow, forming a path that curves toward the barn from off-screen, a significant detail that suggests the location is not entirely abandoned. The description of the foreground trees is also overly complicated; they are simply dark, out-of-focus trunks framing the shot, and the stated difference in their blurriness is not apparent.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A rural scene features a faded red barn with vertical siding and a large, closed hayloft door below its dark, shingled gambrel roof. The landscape is covered in thick snow, and a simple lean-to shed is attached to the barn's left side. To the right, a short, two-rail wooden fence line extends from the barn. Faint tire tracks in the snow form a path curving toward the barn, suggesting the area is not entirely abandoned. The scene is framed by two dark, out-of-focus tree trunks in the foreground, directing the viewer's gaze toward the barn. The overcast sky adds to the wintry atmosphere.
